com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface RadioPlayerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PlayerWrapperListener

    public interface RadioPlayerListener
extends PlayerWrapperListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of a RadioPlayer or ArtistRadioPlayer. Deezer radios limit the number of skips a user can do.
    Author:
    Deezer
